availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert Belt Taylor (Franklin County clerk, bank teller, Union inf captain)

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky, clerk, bank teller, and soldier. Kentucky native. Clerk in Franklin County in 1860. Served in the 32nd Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) as captain from September 4, 1862, to November 15, 1862. Bank teller in Franklin County in 1863. Notary public in Franklin County in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Frankfort District, p. 240.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Court House, p. 70A.

Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 2, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), p. 314.
